```{=html}
<div id="chat-ui" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
  <textarea id="user-query" rows="3" style="width:100%;" placeholder="Ask about the database..."></textarea>
  <button onclick="submitQuery()">Ask</button>
  <pre id="chat-response" style="white-space:pre-wrap;"></pre>
</div>

<script>
    async function submitQuery() {
      const query = document.getElementById("user-query").value;
      const responseElem = document.getElementById("chat-response");
    
      try {
        const response = await fetch("http://localhost:8000/query", {
          method: "POST",
          headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
          body: JSON.stringify({ query: query })
        });
    
        if (!response.ok) {
          responseElem.textContent = `Error: Server returned status ${response.status}`;
          return;
        }
    
        const data = await response.json();
        responseElem.textContent = data.answer;
      } catch (error) {
        responseElem.textContent = `Fetch error: ${error.message}`;
      }
    }

</script>
```
